testcase.name: Verify user is able to sign up
testcase.system-out:
Given I am on the login page of the application on "Chrome".................passed When I try to sign up to the application....................................passed And I enter mandatory fields "test", "name", "testmail@mail.com", "testuser", "admin123".passed And I click on register button..............................................passed Then I should see a confirmation message with "test", "name", "Your personal settings have been registered.".passed And I should see my email "testmail@mail.com" on the user icon dropdown.....passed And I navigate to home page of the application..............................passed And I click on compose option...............................................passed And I enter "naveen", "Hi for Testing", "Hello Mr. Naveen, This is for Testing
From, Naveen1".passed And I click on send message button..........................................passed And I should see the acknowledgement........................................passed
